content: the original autumn skies infinity scarf has a width of 18cm and length of 160cm the pattern is adaptable to any length using stitches in multiples of 2 it uses us terminology and is worked in row skill level - advanced beginner **material list ** yarn dk light worsted weight/ 8 ply/ a soft yarn is recommended hook 4 5mm stitch markers needle to sew in ends scissors you are more than welcome to work the infinity scarf in any yarn of your choice however depending on the yarn and gauge you may have a size difference the pattern does not contain any photo tutorials visit our facebook group for pattern support and other info https //www facebook com/groups/1370975902929963/
